casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Earl EWELL. No. 108P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Mitchell D. Norton, District Attorney, for State.

*327The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of March 2005 by Defendant to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2005."
